message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a product that I believe will be of great value to you.  While I can't disclose all the details at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.  This is a significant discount from what I could potentially get elsewhere. Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
